name: Deadly Shores Dino Hunter
description:
Get ready for the most amazing and thrilling Deadly Shores Dino Hunter game of 2018. This game takes jungle hunting to a whole new level and amazing 3D graphics.
Start the dino hunting and hunt some real wild dinosaurs with your awesome sniper gun. You're a hero survivor walking in a hidden, prehistoric, and the huge Jurassic world, where your mission is to stay alive and kill the biggest and ruthless bloodthirsty dinosaurs with your powerful gun. Your mission to clear the jungle from different dangerous dinosaurs. There are multiple levels of real sniper dino hunting. You would feel as a real fight in this deadly dino jungle game. Your main mission in this dino games is to finish and kill a certain amount of deadly wild dinos at every level. Incredible graphics, realistic environments and deadly hunter gameplay gives you more fun. Now download and enjoy it.
